DESCRIPTION:
Dont miss this golden opportunity to own a strategically located property in the heart of pothencode. Situated just 400 meters from the pothencode bus stand, this property offers unmatched connectivity and convenience.
Surrounded by key amenities such as shopping centers, supermarkets, schools, hospitals, theatres, railway stations, and more, it's ideal for both residential and commercial development. Whether you're planning to build your dream home, launch a business, or invest for the future, this location guarantees excellent returns.
Enjoy easy access to daily essentials and urban comforts while still being in a peaceful, well-Connected neighborhood.

Highlights:

Walking distance to pothencode bus stand
Proximity to trivandrum city, railway stations, and major highways
Close to leading schools, hospitals, and entertainment hubs
Perfect for residential or commercial projects

DESCRIPTION:
This is 5.150 cent property, no house in it.
Looking for the perfect residential plot in a premium locality? This 5.150-Cent square plot in mudavanmugal, trivandrum, is an excellent investment opportunity. Situated in a highly sought-After residential area, this villa plot is surrounded by upscale homes and is ideal for building your dream house.

Key highlights:

Premium location: Located in a well-Established residential area with high-End villas nearby.

Square-Shaped plot: Perfect for designing a spacious and elegant home.

 Location: Prime plot right on the vizhinjam highway, ensuring high visibility and excellent connectivity
